data.title: ğŸ’• ã€ƒ Be respectful and accepting towards other users
data.description: We do not tolerate personal attacks, rudeness, harassment, slurs, doxxing (revealing someone's personal information), or any other similar behaviors and attitude. We are committed to creating a welcoming and inclusive community for all members, and treating everyone with respect and kindness is a crucial part of that.

data.title: #ï¸âƒ£ ã€ƒ Keep content in their intended channel
data.description:
To help keep the server organized and easy to navigate, we ask that you post content in its appropriate place. You can find what each of the channels' use is in their channel topic.

-# To ensure that all members can communicate effectively, we ask that you only use English when communicating with others on the server.

data.title: ğŸ•Šï¸ ã€ƒ No political or religious discussions
data.description: To avoid potentially sensitive or divisive conversations, please refrain from discussing political or religious topics anywhere on the server. If you wish to continue these types of conversations, use the direct message to the willing members.

data.title: ğŸ” ã€ƒ Have an appropriate profile
data.description: Your profile must not be offensive, disruptive, or confusing. Avoid using excessive emojis or special characters that could make it difficult for others to mention or message you. Additionally, you are not allowed to impersonate other users or staff members to slander or cause controversies using their image.

data.title: ğŸµï¸ ã€ƒ Do not spam
data.description: Spamming or repeatedly sending unwanted messages, images, or other content is disallowed. his rule includes using all caps, excessive emojis, or sending multiple messages in a row. Please be mindful of the ongoing conversation and do not interrupt unless you have something relevant to contribute.

data.title: ğŸ“£ ã€ƒ Listen to our staff members
data.description:
Our staff members help keep the server running smoothly and ensure everyone has a positive experience. If a staff member asks you to stop due to certain behaviors or take a specific action, please listen and do your best to comply.

If you have any concerns or issues with a staff member's behavior, then reach out one of our administrators in private, and they will do their best to assess the situation.
